ComicInfo.Title: Anti-Tank Squad!; Last-Ditch Fight!; Breakthrough!; Sebastopol; War of Nerves
ComicInfo.Summary: Historical account of nurse Florence Nightingale (1820-1910) at the Siege of Sevastopol (1854-1855) during the Crimean War.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Maneely,Paul Reinman,Dick Ayers,Ross Andru,Gene Colan,Joe Maneely,Paul Reinman,Dick Ayers,Ross Andru,Gene Colan
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Maneely,Paul Reinman,Dick Ayers,Mike Esposito,Gene Colan,Joe Maneely,Paul Reinman,Dick Ayers,Mike Esposito,Gene Colan
